sourcesContent:
import React, { useContext, useState } from 'react' import LayoutContext from '../context/layout/LayoutContext'; //import { useNavigate } from 'react-router-dom' const AddLayout = () => { const context = useContext(LayoutContext); const [layout, setLayout] = useState({pName:"", sku:"", category:"", size:"", color:"", sDiscription:"", lDescription:"", phone:""}) const {addLayouts } = context //let navigate = useNavigate() const handleClic =(e)=>{ e.preventDefault(); addLayouts(layout.pName,layout.sku, layout.category, layout.size,layout.color,layout.sDiscription,layout.lDescription,layout.phone); setLayout({pName:"", sku:"", category:"", size:"", color:"", sDiscription:"", lDescription:"", phone:""}) // navigate("/Layout2"); } const onChange =(e)=>{ setLayout({...layout, [e.target.name]: e.target.value}) } return (
) } export default AddLayout
